US-China relations: Expect more turbulence in 2024After a year that brought panic over spy balloons, a fight over semiconductors and an intensifying military rivalry, China and the U.S. are ending the year with an uneasy detente. Wed, 20 Dec 2023 11:06:37 GMT BOIUY7S4MBLI7IE4UF6TFFGXQE https://www.reuters.com/world/expect-more-turbulence-us-china-2024-2023-12-20/Don Durfee, Antoni Slodkowski世界
Asia feels the sting of India's onion export banIndia's ban on the export of onions has driven up prices of the vegetable for Asian buyers, who are scrambling for cheaper alternatives, particularly as New Delhi is unlikely to lift the curbs before general elections next year. Wed, 20 Dec 2023 09:10:00 GMT BSSLKN3YG5KN7OITXYW5AUYJFY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/asia-feels-sting-indias-onion-export-ban-2023-12-20/Rajendra Jadhav, Ruma Paul, Gopal Sharma世界亚太地区
Weakened polar vortex seen as likely culprit behind China's big chillThe cause of a wave of bitingly cold air that swept into China and rewrote seasonal records for low temperatures may lie further north. Wed, 20 Dec 2023 07:24:12 GMT TM76UKXLHBNKTJAECWWW7EU6AU https://www.reuters.com/world/china/weakened-polar-vortex-seen-likely-culprit-behind-chinas-big-chill-2023-12-20/Ryan Woo世界中国
US and China remain top credit ratings to watch in 2024The U.S. and China on downgrade warnings, Turkey hoping for its first upgrade in a decade and Israel facing its first cut - plus more than 50 elections to navigate - means 2024 could bring pivotal moves in some sovereign credit ratings. Wed, 20 Dec 2023 06:14:29 GMT XX4WOPWIRZP2JJEF656C3U2NGI https://www.reuters.com/markets/us-china-remain-top-credit- ratings-watch-2024-2023-12-20/Marc Jones市场宏观问题
Philippines rebukes China over South China Sea claimsThe Philippine defence minister rebuked China on Wednesday for accusing his country of provoking tension and stirring trouble in the South China Sea, saying only Beijing believed what it was saying. Wed, 20 Dec 2023 05:58:56 GMT EVQKL3KGTJJ7NHDYNLKHOR4OCM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/philippines-rebukes-china-over-south-china-sea-claims-2023-12-20/Reuters世界亚太地区
Taiwan to 'handle' spate of Chinese balloons based on threat levelTaiwan will "handle" Chinese balloons flying nearby based on threat assessments, though officials believe the current wave is for weather purposes, driven by the prevailing winds at this time of year, the defence ministry in Taipei said on Wednesday. Wed, 20 Dec 2023 04:48:46 GMT 6LXGRZ4NNJMLPPZNXRGLJK2XN4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-handle-spate-chinese-balloons-based-threat-level-2023-12-20/Reuters世界亚太地区
